text: Anama hutoge'za kagu'vazama eri fore'ma nehaza vahe'ma, zagoma neraza vaheki, ofuntamima nehampriza vahe'ma, henkama fore'ma hania zanku'ma kasnampa kema nehaza vahe'mo'za nagrite azage'na ana ava'nama ke'noa zamofo nanekea zamasami'noe. Hianagi magomo'e huno ana ava'namofo agafa'a eri amara huno onasami'ne.
